pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pyuhoo[![PyPi version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/pyuhoo.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pyuhoods/)[![pre-commit.ci status](https://results.pre-commit.ci/badge/github/csacca/pyuhoo/master.svg)](https://results.pre-commit.ci/latest/github/csacca/pyuhoo/master)![ci workflow](https://github.com/csacca/pyuhoo/actions/workflows/ci.yaml/badge.svg)Python API for talking to uHoo consumer APIPlease note that this is a non-public API that has been reverse-engineered from mobileapps. It is likely to break unexpectedly when uHoo changes the API.
